name: Connecting cities
description: Connecting cities (hereinafter referred to as ccs) is committed to creating a borderless blockchain world. With the help of CCS, we can create such a world-a world where people are directly connected, trustless, collaborative, point-to-point exchange, and value-driven under the consensus of the community or society. The CCS blockchain will enable humans to collaborate on a large scale in a trustless and geographically unrestricted manner. The future is here, and change is imminent
